name: Buzz!: Master Quiz
description:
Take the popular game show host on the road with BUZZ!™: Master Quiz for the PSP® system! BUZZ!™: Master Quiz includes over 3,000 unique questions on topics including music, celebrities, TV, sports, science, nature, movies and more. Put your knowledge to the test at home or on the move, and challenge others in three multiplayer modes.
Features:

• Over 3,000 Unique Questions
• Hundreds of Picture, Video, and Music Assets
• Enhanced Single-Player Mode with 15 Quiz Challenges
• Six Single and Multiplayer Round Types
• Three Multiplayer Modes: Pass Around, Fastest Finger, Quiz Master
• Online Multiplayer with 2-4 players, Offline with up to 6 players
• BUZZ!™ buzzers Not Required — the PSP® System Becomes Your Buzzer!
